output.ticket:
<% var dropsAmount = OB.DEC.Zero, depositsAmount = OB.DEC.Zero; %>
logofb.png
<%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('OBPOS_LblUser')+': '+ OB.POS.modelterminal.get('context').user._identifier) %>
<%= OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('OBPOS_LblTime')+': '+ new Date().toString().substring(3,24)) %>
<%=OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('OBPOS_LblNetSales')) %> <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(cashup.transactions.models[0].get('netSales')) %>
<% cashup.transactions.models[0].get('salesTaxes').forEach(function(tax){ %>
<%=OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(tax.taxName+' * '+ OB.I18N.formatCurrency(cashup.transactions.models[0].get('netSales'))) %> <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(tax.taxAmount) %>
<% }); %>
<%=OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('OBPOS_LblGrossSales')) %> <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(cashup.transactions.models[0].get('grossSales')) %>
<%=OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('OBPOS_LblNetReturns')) %> <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(cashup.transactions.models[0].get('netReturns')) %>
<% cashup.transactions.models[0].get('returnsTaxes').forEach(function(tax){ %>
<%=OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(tax.taxName+' * '+ OB.I18N.formatCurrency(cashup.transactions.models[0].get('netReturns'))) %> <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(tax.taxAmount) %>
<% }); %>
<%=OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('OBPOS_LblGrossReturns')) %> <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(cashup.transactions.models[0].get('grossReturns')) %>
<%=OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('OBPOS_LblTotalRetailTrans')) %> <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(cashup.transactions.models[0].get('totalRetailTransactions')) %>
<% cashup.transactions.models[0].get('drops').forEach(function(drop){ dropsAmount = OB.DEC.add(dropsAmount,drop.amount); %>
<%=drop.description %> <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(drop.amount) %>
<% }); %>
<%=OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('OBPOS_LblTotalDrops')) %> <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(dropsAmount) %>
<% cashup.transactions.models[0].get('deposits').forEach(function(deposit){ depositsAmount = OB.DEC.add(depositsAmount,deposit.amount); %>
<%=deposit.description %> <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(deposit.amount) %>
<% }); %>
<%=OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('OBPOS_LblTotalDeposits')) %> <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(depositsAmount) %>
<% cashup.paymentmethods.forEach(function(payment){ %>
<%=OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(payment.get('name')+' '+ OB.I18N.getLabel('OBPOS_LblExpected')) %> <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(payment.get('expected')) %>
<% }); %>
<%=OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('OBPOS_LblTotalExpected')) %> <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(cashup.get('totalExpected')) %>
<% cashup.paymentmethods.forEach(function(payment){ %>
<%=OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(payment.get('name')+' '+ OB.I18N.getLabel('OBPOS_LblCounted')) %> <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(payment.get('counted')) %>
<% }); %>
<%=OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('OBPOS_LblTotalCounted')) %> <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(cashup.get('totalCounted')) %>
<% cashup.paymentmethods.forEach(function(payment){ %>
<%=OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(payment.get('name')+' '+ OB.I18N.getLabel('OBPOS_LblDifference')) %> <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(OB.DEC.sub(payment.get('counted'),payment.get('expected'))) %>
<% }); %>
<%=OB.UTIL.encodeXMLComponent(OB.I18N.getLabel('OBPOS_LblTotalDifference')) %> <%= OB.I18N.formatCurrency(cashup.get('totalDifference')) %>
